## Probability Density Functions

R pseudo and parameters:

    -     binom = size, prob
    -     chisq = df, ncp
    -     f     = df1, df2, ncp
    -     norm  = mean, sd
    -     hyper = m, n, k
    -     pois  = lambda
    -     t     = df, ncp
    -     unif  = min, max
